Articles.Content:
Hello, I want to animate parts with Blender and Unity, but I don\'t know at all how to do it.

I already know creating mesh and textures with Blender. I\'ve done these mods here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13774.0

I want to replace all the parts using Multijoint plugin by parts animated directly in the game.

I don\'t find a tutorial about this. Can someone tell me how to do it or make a step by step tutorial (it would be perfect)?
You might want to ask the creator/s of Damned Robotics.
